title: Status of my Thresh Statue?
body: Hi I recently sent back my Thresh statue on account of it being damaged and I was told I would be sent a new one, but haven't heard anything back since, which was over 2 weeks ago. Any way I can figure out what's going on?

replies.body: Looking into this for you, I see that your specialist printed out a return label for you.  Were you able to get that sent out?  I don't have any visibility on merch orders, but our merch team can help!  Reach out to us in a ticket and we can take a closer look and see what's going on.  We'll get back to you!
